main.name: Victor
main.occupation: software engineer with a focus on front end development
main.description: I'm passionate in perfecting my craft and creating immersive experiences
main.bio: I'm a Dallas, TX based software engineer with a focus on front end development. I'm passionate in perfecting my craft and creating, rich, performant, accessible, and immersive experiences with React. I was raised in Miami and consequently love the water. In my spare time I enjoy traveling, catching up with friends, and training at the gym.

education.description: At the University of Florida, we are a people of purpose. We're committed to challenging convention and ourselves. We see things not as they are, but as they could be. And we strive for a greater impact: one measured in people helped and lives improved.

work.title: UI Engineer
work.description: Verizon is one of the largest communication technology companies in the world. With over 150 locations, Verizon is a global leader delivering innovative communications and technology solutions that improve the way our customers live, work, learn and play.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
